org.vaniglia.pool.vsop
Class ObjectsPool

java.lang.Object
  org.vaniglia.pool.vsop.ObjectsPool
public class ObjectsPool
extends java.lang.Object

This is a simple object pool. This pool is NOT thread safe. If you need to use a pool in multithreaded envoronment, please use the MTObjectPool, a MultiThreaded Object Pool based on this class.

Field Summary
private  java.lang.String initializeMethodName
          Name of the initialization method if any.
private  boolean initializeNewObjects
          If true the pool initializes new objects when the pool is empty, otherwise returns null to the get methods.

Field Detail

pool

private java.lang.Object[] pool
This field is a pool of Objects belonging to this Pool. The object pool is used to improve performances via object reuse.

poolHead

private int poolHead

objectsClass

private java.lang.Class objectsClass
Class of the objects in the pool

initializeNewObjects

private boolean initializeNewObjects
If true the pool initializes new objects when the pool is empty, otherwise returns null to the get methods.

initializeMethodName

private java.lang.String initializeMethodName
Name of the initialization method if any.

poolInitialSize

private int poolInitialSize
Initial size of the objects pool. When the pools needs to grow it's size is doubled every time.

poolMaxSize

private int poolMaxSize
Maximum number of objects in the pool. If the pool has reached this size, all the object release are discarded and available to the garbage collector.

strongChecking

private boolean strongChecking
Constructor Detail

ObjectsPool

public ObjectsPool()
Creates a new ObjectsPool without specifying the handled objects class. In this way the pool is unable to initialize new Objects and so it will return null when the pool is clear.
